title: How do I unlock the screen using my fingerprint?
answer: Go to Settings > All > Privacy & passwords > Fingerprint ID > Fingerprint management. When you access Fingerprint management for the first time, you need to create a screen-lock password. Then follow the onscreen instructions to enroll your fingerprints. After your fingerprints are enrolled, the fingerprint unlock feature is enabled automatically. You can also set it manually under Fingerprint management.
